prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey! Just wanted to check in and see how you’re doing. 

Reminder: Your appointment is scheduled for tomorrow at 3 PM. 

Hi! Can we reschedule our lunch to next week? Let me know what works for you.

Your package has been shipped and should arrive by Friday. 

Don’t forget about the community meeting this Thursday at 6 PM. 

Your bank statement is ready for review. 

Hey, I saw that movie you recommended! It was amazing!

Just a heads up, the report is due next Monday. 

Could you please confirm if you’ll be attending the event on Saturday?

Your OTP is 123456 for verification. 

Thanks for your payment! Your subscription has been successfully renewed. 

Let’s catch up soon! It’s been too long.

Quick reminder: The deadline for the project is next Friday.

I hope you’re having a great day!

We’ve received your feedback. Thank you for your input!

Your delivery is out for delivery and will arrive soon. 

Looking forward to seeing you at the family reunion next month!

Please let me know if you need assistance with anything.

Congrats on your promotion! Let’s celebrate soon!

Just wanted to remind you about the potluck this weekend. 

Your car service is confirmed for tomorrow at 10 AM.

Hello! How's your week going so far?

The team meeting has been rescheduled for Wednesday at 2 PM.

Your appointment has been successfully canceled. 

I’m here if you want to talk about anything.

The event was a huge success! Thank you for your help! 

Your password has been successfully changed.

Can you send me the details for the presentation again? 

Hope everything is going well with your new job!

Just checking in on your project progress. 

Your order has been delivered! 

Thanks for your patience while we resolved your issue.

Don’t forget to submit your travel expenses by the end of the month.

Hey! Are we still on for our hike this weekend?

Your feedback survey is ready. We appreciate your insights!

Excited for the concert next week! Let me know if you want to carpool.

Just wanted to remind you that your trial period ends soon.

Your account has been temporarily locked for security reasons. 

Let me know if you want to grab coffee sometime this week!

Thanks for your support during the event. 

Your balance is low. Please top up your account soon.

Looking forward to our meeting tomorrow at 9 AM.

Hi! Just wanted to say I’m thinking of you.

Your flight has been confirmed for next month. Safe travels!

Let’s plan a game night soon! 

Your request has been processed, and you should receive a confirmation shortly. 

Hope you’re enjoying your vacation! 

Just a friendly reminder to take a break today. 

Your device is updated and ready to use. 

If you need any help with the project, feel free to reach out!
